description: Returns the resource-based policy document attached to the resource in JSON format.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the billing view resource to which the policy is attached to.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the billing view resource to which the policy is attached to.

nested_items.name: policy
nested_items.description: The resource-based policy document attached to the resource in JSON format.
